title: About me
name: Wilmer Medina
paragraphs: Developer with the ability to adapt to different environments and technologies. I am motivated to learn new tools and contribute to varied projects, from web applications to more technical solutions oriented to processes or data.
I am currently perfecting my skills in web architecture, interaction design and UI/UX best practices.
